body: Hi Luciano, If you ask me Ecotect should have given you an error as there are bunch of -- numbers in your file. It should be a bug in the script of university of Southampton and you probably want to let them know. I replaced -- with - and it is fine now. Check the attached file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/51GNwYDFQ0SrkpCni8zHlWWDnJ12AHDGfM8qJTw9HMVALE4vjAKTApp55wRF0hSpxGxnopT*w1y4L74S4Uj6*MsdsjOdRXsL/WrongNumber.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/51GNwYDFQ0T6tt3MXpaQE6eWpXSxbAacbUawUHxQ0JPqS7CbRBFhUxj-RDoT7aGQMivd6EgAyqolLgPUBsvjWov2nlD-aCSd/importEPW3Dchart.png) Cheers, Mostapha
